item.title: Artificial light has essentially lengthened birds' day
item.description: Millions of audio recordings of hundreds of bird species have revealed that artificial light is making the birds wake up earlier and go to bed later.

item.title: With Fed under pressure, Jerome Powell prepares for a high-stakes speech
item.description: The Fed chair will speak Friday at an annual economic symposium in Jackson Hole, Wyo. The speech comes as the central bank is under mounting pressure ...

item.title: An appeals court throws out a massive civil fraud penalty against President Trump
item.description: Trump, in a social media post, claimed "total victory" after the ruling, which spares him from a potential half-billion-dollar fine for decades of exa...

item.title: Hurricane Erin brings flooding to parts of Outer Banks as it pivots from East Coast
item.description: The storm flooded parts of North Carolina's Outer Banks, including a section of the main highway. It's now turning away from the East Coast, but dange...

item.title: Walmart says tariff costs are rising 'each week' and will continue
item.description: The world's largest retailer — like many others — has been absorbing most of the increased costs, but raising prices of some goods.
